## Project Overview
Seenit is a TV show and movie tracking application built with Next.js 14+ (App Router), TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. It uses the TMDb API for fetching movie/TV show data.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- TMDb API
- NextAuth.js (for future authentication)

## Development Guidelines
- Use App Router structure (not Pages Router)
- API routes in app/api/
- Components in components/
- Utilities in lib/
- Type definitions in types/
